languages.text: Канцлер Версериан сообщила о тревожных новостях, касающихся Футфола и других династий Вольных Торговцев. Пока соглядатаи фон Валанциус собирают сведения о происходящих в Просторе Коронус событиях, Лорд-капитану придется набраться терпения и готовиться к непредвиденным событиям.

traits.locale_text: Канцлер Версериан сообщила о тревожных новостях, касающихся Футфола и других династий Вольных Торговцев. Пока соглядатаи фон Валанциус собирают сведения о происходящих в Просторе Коронус событиях, Лорд-капитану придется набраться терпения и готовиться к непредвиденным событиям.

languages.text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.
languages.original_text: Канцлер Версериан сообщила о тревожных новостях, касающихся Футфола и других династий Вольных Торговцев. Пока соглядатаи фон Валанциус собирают сведения о происходящих в Просторе Коронус событиях, Лорд-капитану придется набраться терпения и готовиться к непредвиденным событиям.

traits.locale_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of the troubling developments regarding Footfall and other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, Lord Captain needs to patiently wait and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

languages.text: La chancelière Werserian a fait part d'événements troublants à Castel et au sein des dynasties d'autres libres-marchands. Pendant que les espions des von Valancius sont occupés à récolter des renseignements sur ce qu'il se passe dans les Étendues de Koronus, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit attendre patiemment et se préparer à tout imprévu.
languages.original_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

traits.locale_text: La chancelière Werserian a fait part d'événements troublants à Castel et au sein des dynasties d'autres libres-marchands. Pendant que les espions des von Valancius sont occupés à récolter des renseignements sur ce qu'il se passe dans les Étendues de Koronus, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit attendre patiemment et se préparer à tout imprévu.

languages.text: 韦尔森宰相带来了令人担忧的消息，告知行商浪人落脚港与其他行商浪人王朝的现状。冯·瓦兰修斯家族的特工正在忙于收集情报，弄清科罗努斯扩区目前的状况，而行商浪人需要耐心等待，为一切不可预见的事态发展做好准备。
languages.original_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

traits.locale_text: 韦尔森宰相带来了令人担忧的消息，告知行商浪人落脚港与其他行商浪人王朝的现状。冯·瓦兰修斯家族的特工正在忙于收集情报，弄清科罗努斯扩区目前的状况，而行商浪人需要耐心等待，为一切不可预见的事态发展做好准备。

languages.text: ウェルザリアン宰相がフットフォールや他の自由開拓者の王朝で起きている厄介な出来事についての知らせを持ってきた。フォン・ヴァランシウスのスパイがコロヌス・エクスパンスで起きている事案の情報収集に多忙を極めている間、ロード・キャプテンは辛抱強く待ち、不測の事態に備える必要がある。
languages.original_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

traits.locale_text: ウェルザリアン宰相がフットフォールや他の自由開拓者の王朝で起きている厄介な出来事についての知らせを持ってきた。フォン・ヴァランシウスのスパイがコロヌス・エクスパンスで起きている事案の情報収集に多忙を極めている間、ロード・キャプテンは辛抱強く待ち、不測の事態に備える必要がある。

languages.text: Kanzlerin Werserian hat von beunruhigenden Vorkommnissen auf Footfall und in anderen Freihändler-Dynastien berichtet. Die Spione der Dynastie von Valancius beschaffen Informationen zu den Ereignissen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Der Lord Captain muss geduldig abwarten und sich auf unvorhergesehene Entwicklungen einstellen.
languages.original_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

traits.locale_text: Kanzlerin Werserian hat von beunruhigenden Vorkommnissen auf Footfall und in anderen Freihändler-Dynastien berichtet. Die Spione der Dynastie von Valancius beschaffen Informationen zu den Ereignissen in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Der Lord Captain muss geduldig abwarten und sich auf unvorhergesehene Entwicklungen einstellen.

languages.text: La canciller Werserian trae noticias de sucesos preocupantes en Paso y en las otras dinastías de Comerciantes Independientes. Mientras los espías de la casa von Valancius recopilan los datos sobre la situación en la Extensión de Koronus, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe tener paciencia y prepararse para cualquier cosa.
languages.original_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.

traits.locale_text: La canciller Werserian trae noticias de sucesos preocupantes en Paso y en las otras dinastías de Comerciantes Independientes. Mientras los espías de la casa von Valancius recopilan los datos sobre la situación en la Extensión de Koronus, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe tener paciencia y prepararse para cualquier cosa.

languages.text: Şansölye Werserian, Binliman'da ve diğer Hür Tacir hanedanlıklarında yaşanan talihsiz olaylara dair haberler getirdi. Von Valancius ajanları Koronus Enginliği'nde yaşananlara dair istihbarat toplamakla meşgulken Lord Kaptan, sabırla beklemeli ve öngörülemeyen gelişmelere kendini hazırlamalı.
languages.original_text: Chancellor Werserian brought news of troubling events on Footfall and in other Rogue Trader dynasties. While von Valancius spies are busy collecting intel on the events unfolding in the Koronus Expanse, the Lord Captain needs to wait patiently and prepare for any unforeseen developments.
